title: Head & Shoulders Smooth and Silky Anti Dandruff Shampoo, 650ml
description: Quantity: 650ml; Item Form: Foam Richly indulgent anti-dandruff shampoo for dry, damaged or frizzy hair, Leaves hair up to 100% dandruff free; Gentle enough for everyday use, even for color or chemically treated hair Formulated with Head and Shouldersâ€™ Fresh Scent Technology featuring enhanced fragrance notes for an improved in-shower scent experience. Visible flakes with regular use Hair Type: Frizzy Hair. For best results, use at least twice a week or as directed by a doctor Usage: Shake before use. Wet hair. Gently massage onto scalp. Lather and rinse thoroughly. Repeat if desired.
